data.title: Fujitsu
data.meta_description: Fujitsu company and contact information including phone number, address, e-mail address, and other contact and company related information.
data.text:
The Fujitsu company was first established on June 20, 1935, and is a Japaneese company that makes various computer-related products.

Fujitsu ICL was founded in 1985 and produces handheld systems and other business solution hardware.

Fujitsu Computer Products of America was founded in 1991 and is a large manufacturer of hard disk drives, tape drives, and other computer peripherals.

Fujitsu PC Corporation was founded in 1996 and is a large manufacturer of laptop computers.

Contact information

Phone: (800) 8FUJITSU Hard drives: (800) 626-4686 Scanners: (800) 626-4686 Notebook computers: (800) 8FUJITSU Printers: (800) 626-4686 Tape drives: (800) 626-4686 Fax: (408) 432-6333 TDD: None or unknown Website: Fujitsu official website E-mail: Fujitsu support Address: Fujitsu Corporate Headquarters

1250 East Arques Avenue, M/S 333

Sunnyvale, CA Stock: FJTSY
